Name: Zain Anti-Lice Comb Z-311045 - The Ultimate Solution for Lice Removal
Description:
Say goodbye to irritating lice with the **Zain Anti-Lice Comb Z-311045**, the ultimate solution for lice-free families. This meticulously designed comb, crafted from pure stainless steel, offers an effective and gentle experience for the scalp. Its fine and tight teeth are specially engineered to effectively remove lice and nits without causing hair damage. Lightweight and compact, you can take it with you wherever you go. Its ergonomic design ensures a secure grip during use, making it an indispensable tool for hair care.

**Features:**
‚≠ê Made from high-quality, pure stainless steel.
‚≠ê Fine and tight teeth for maximum effectiveness in removing lice and nits.
‚≠ê Lightweight and compact design for easy portability and use anywhere.
‚≠ê Attractive pink shade.
‚≠ê Durable and long-lasting for years of use.

üîπ Usage Instructions for **Zain Anti-Lice Comb Z-311045**:
‚≠ê Shampoo hair thoroughly before use.
‚≠ê Apply conditioner to make combing easier.
‚≠ê Towel dry the hair.
‚≠ê Place an extra towel on shoulders to catch falling lice.
‚≠ê Divide hair into small sections and secure with clips.
‚≠ê Start combing each section from the scalp to the ends, getting as close to the scalp as possible.
‚≠ê Wipe the comb with a towel or tissue after each stroke to remove lice and nits.
‚≠ê Rinse hair with plain water after finishing.
‚≠ê Repeat the process every few days for complete lice eradication.
‚≠ê Clean and disinfect the comb thoroughly after each use.

üîπ Ingredients of **Zain Anti-Lice Comb Z-311045**:
‚≠ê 100% Pure Stainless Steel.

#AntiLice #LiceTreatment #HairCare #KidsEssentials #HealthyHair #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh #Dammam #HairHealth
Short description: Eliminate lice effectively with the **Zain Anti-Lice Comb Z-311045** made of stainless steel. Gentle and efficient for the whole family's hair.

Name: Zain Anti-Lice Comb With Hand - The Ultimate Solution for Lice-Free Hair
Description:
Getting rid of lice is no longer a difficult task with the **Zain Anti-Lice Comb With Hand**. This innovative comb is designed for highly efficient removal of lice and nits, even the most stubborn ones. It features fine, closely spaced needles made of stainless steel to ensure all lice are captured. Its compact and lightweight design with a comfortable handle makes it easy to carry and use anywhere.

**Product Features:**
‚≠ê Fine and closely spaced needles for maximum effectiveness.
‚≠ê Made from high-quality stainless steel.
‚≠ê Compact and lightweight design for easy portability.
‚≠ê Available in an elegant green color.
‚≠ê Comfortable handle for a better grip during use.

üîπ Usage Instructions for **Zain Anti-Lice Comb With Hand**:
‚≠ê Wash hair thoroughly with a medicated shampoo and conditioner.
‚≠ê Dry hair with a clean towel, and avoid using a hairdryer.
‚≠ê Place a towel over the shoulders to catch falling lice.
‚≠ê Section the hair into small parts using clips.
‚≠ê Begin combing each section from the scalp to ensure thorough removal of lice and nits.
‚≠ê After finishing, safely dispose of the used towel.
‚≠ê Rinse hair again with shampoo to remove any residue.
‚≠ê Dry hair with a clean towel.

üîπ Ingredients of **Zain Anti-Lice Comb With Hand**:
‚≠ê Stainless Steel (Needles).
‚≠ê Plastic (Handle).

Name: Zain Anti-Lice Comb with Lens - Effective Lice Removal Solution
Description:
Say goodbye to pesky lice with the **Zain Anti-Lice Comb with Lens**! This advanced comb is meticulously designed for maximum effectiveness in removing lice and nits from hair and scalp. What sets the **Zain Anti-Lice Comb with Lens** apart is its integrated magnifying lens, allowing you to precisely locate and easily remove lice, ensuring complete eradication. Crafted from high-quality stainless steel, this comb guarantees durability and longevity. Its compact and lightweight design makes it perfect for carrying anywhere, and its bright pink color adds a touch of comfort and appeal.

üîπ Usage Instructions for **Zain Anti-Lice Comb with Lens**
‚≠ê Wash hair thoroughly with shampoo (medicated shampoo can also be used).
‚≠ê Apply conditioner to make hair smooth and easier for the comb to pass through.
‚≠ê Dry hair with a towel.
‚≠ê Place a towel over shoulders to collect fallen lice.
‚≠ê Part hair into sections using clips or bands.
‚≠ê Slowly run the comb from the scalp to the ends of each section, avoiding roughness.
‚≠ê Repeat the process at regular intervals for complete lice elimination.
‚≠ê A final shower is recommended after completion.

üîπ Ingredients of **Zain Anti-Lice Comb with Lens**
‚≠ê High-quality stainless steel.
‚≠ê Integrated magnifying lens.
‚≠ê Comfortable handle (please do not boil the comb in hot water).
